Yes, to skip the serial and e-mail we need a cracked ascrypt_pro.dll !
we can find the  ascrypt_pro.dll when the game is installed, so we just have to wait on an installed version or on a serial an email.

Guys, ascrpyt_pro.dll is not in the installed folder. It is in a temp folder when you start the installer. You need a ascrpypt_pro.dll which is edited to skip serial and e-mail. Someone who got experience has to do it, or we need a ripped instalation.

Det är inte spelet i sig som är svårt att cracka, det är Aerosoft Launcher som är den stora haklen, Aerosfts onlineserver för aktiveringen av spelet. Oavsett om du köper en download, elelr en boxad version så måste du aktivera spelet via Aerosofts server.

It is not the game itself is difficult to crack, its Aerosoft Launcher which is the issue here, Aerosfts online game server for the "activation of the game". 

Whether you purchase a download, or a boxad version, you must make a mandatory activation of the game via the Aerosofts server. 

And Aerosoft has refined their techniques: only three activations on ONE single computer, so go ahead, buy the game insteas, â‚¬29.99 it not that much money...
